title: Italian style sausage pasta
ingredients: ['4 pork sausages', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon mild chilli powder', '1 teaspoon onion granules', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 small red onion, diced', '1/2 red pepper, diced', '3 cloves garlic, diced', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1 teaspoon tomato puree', 'salt and ground black pepper', '1 to 2 teaspoons dried mixed herbs (basil, oregano, parsley)', '400g fusilli pasta', 'black olives (optional)', 'grated cheese (optional)']
